version_description:
We are pleased to announce that the top-selling binaural brainwave app just got even better!

15 NEW DOSES! With over 100 of the world's most powerful brainwave doses, this is the largest mobile collected of simulated experiences available anywhere.

HYPERSKIN ENGINE! The age old debate over Skeuomorph or Flat design is over. Now, you can choose! Completely change the look and feel of your experience at the touch of a button.

VOICE-GUIDED HELP! The Experience method, tutorial, and videos show you how to use binaural brainwave doses. Over 83% success rate across millions of users.

DOSE FILTERING AND FAVORITES! Filter doses based on your mood or select your favorites for easy access.

APPLE WATCH! Reference your SlipStream from your Apple Watch and stay connected to your journey.

SPLIT SCREEN SLIDEOVER! Apple's best new features connected to the world's best brainwave app.

UI and SOUND OVERHAUL! Complete re-design of the user interface, but still keeping the classic look and feel of I-Doser.

QUEUE MULTIPLE! Now you can duplicate doses in the SlipStream if you want multiple hits of the same dose.
